skills.title: Full-Stack Web Development
skills.description: Experience building web applications with React for the front end and exploring back-end frameworks. Skilled at creating user-friendly interfaces and implementing authentication and data handling.

skills.title: Problem-Solving & Debugging
skills.description: Strong ability to troubleshoot coding issues and find creative solutions, demonstrated through independent projects like developing an online store app.

skills.title: Teamwork & Communication
skills.description: Developed through work as a waiter and assistant manager, balancing responsibilities, collaborating with teammates, and delivering clear, friendly service in fast-paced environments.

skills.title: Technical Adaptability
skills.description: Quick to learn new tools and technologies. Comfortable with GitHub and VS Code while being able to apply them effectively in both academic and professional projects.

portfolio.title: Online Store App
portfolio.description: Technologies: React, Supabase Authentication. Developed a front-end android app with user authentication and a responsive design. Implemented login and registration using Supabase through React. Currently expanding features to include product listings and checkout functionality. This project demonstrates my ability to build scalable front-end applications and integrate authentication systems.
